name: Deserted (efeijo)
description:
This is a simple game made with Common Lisp, trivial-gamekit and Tiled.

Requires OpenGL 2.1+

You were deserted by you previous crew, but you know the location of their treasure, hidden in the desert. When you arrive there, the chest is locked. You know the key is hidden around there, but there are cursed skeletons all around.

Will you be able to get the treasure all for yourself?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Action

Escape - Restart

Source code: https://github.com/eliasfeijo/deserted (MIT)

Programming and Idea

Elias Feijó
